summary: CRM app (NIRMALA SOL) with purple sidebar. Building full CRM with real backend data storage (Motoko canister), working buttons, dashboard/pipeline showing only actual entered data (starting at 0), auto-update on data entry, visible sidebar text, and Refer & Earn section removed.
architectural_notes: Backend: Motoko canister on Internet Computer for permanent data storage
Sidebar sections: Dashboard, Contacts, Pipeline, Templates, Reports, Other Services, Admin, Settings, Sign Out (no Refer & Earn)
known_issues: Sidebar text not visible (dark text on purple background)
Dashboard and Pipeline show fake/sample data instead of real entered data

existing_features.title: Fix sidebar text and icon visibility: all navigation labels (Dashboard, Contacts, Pipeline, Templates, Reports, Other Services, Admin, Settings, Sign Out) must render in white or light-colored text/icons so they are clearly readable against the purple sidebar background.
Remove the 'Refer & Earn' menu item completely from the sidebar navigation.

Dashboard must display only real data fetched from the backend. All metrics (lead count, deal count, pipeline stats, etc.) must start at 0 when no data has been entered and automatically update as data is added.
Pipeline page must display only deals that have been actually added by the user, fetched from the backend. It must start empty and update automatically when new deals are added.

Make all action buttons fully functional: 'Add Contact', 'Add Lead', 'Add Deal', and any other create/edit/delete buttons must open their respective forms, submit data to the backend, and reflect changes in the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Sidebar text visibility fix - white/light text on purple background
Real backend data storage using Motoko canister - permanently save all CRM data
Dashboard shows only actual entered data, starting at 0, auto-updates when data is added
Pipeline shows only added deals, auto-updates when deals are added
All buttons (Add Contact, Add Deal, etc.) must be fully functional
Remove Refer & Earn section from sidebar

Implement persistent backend storage in the Motoko canister for all core CRM entities: leads/contacts, deals, and pipeline stages. All CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) must persist data across sessions.
